diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a malignant thoracic paraganglioma metastatic to the bone, lungs, and mediastinal lymph nodes, which was confirmed by histological evaluation showing metastatic infiltration by a neuroendocrine tumor. Additionally, loss of heterozygosity (LOH) was demonstrated in the tumor tissue, and the presence of the SDHC mutation c.397C/H11022T (p.Arg133*) was identified as the underlying cause of malignancy.
